title: "Your Shop" Not Loading
body:
We've noticed a large number of reports of Your Shop not loading correctly or not allowing you to purchase the items in Your Shop. We're working on getting those discounts fixed up as quickly as possible, and in the meantime we may be able to get those personalized offers loaded by refreshing the client!

Stay updated on our progress through updates here, as well as on our [**status page**](https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na).

> **EDIT:  5:00 PM PST**  NA "Your Shop" should be back up and running. Let us know if you're still having troubles seeing those discounts!
